name: Technology is not Cheating
description:
This game made for "Major Jam 4: Cosmic" in 96 Hour (Actual jam is 168 Hour).

Jam Theme: Cosmic - Jam Limitation: The Player Must Cheat

Story:

You are a space pilot whose ship has run out of fuel. You need to find some crystal fuel, but there is no technological civilization nearby. Your computer said that there is a planet which has a civilization, and more importantly crystal fuel. Go there and get the crystal, but be kind to these little creatures. Or don't be. But there is a god watching over you.

How to Play:

A-D-Space is for movement

Mouse Left Click for aim.

X is for infrared mode: In this mode you can see door keys and booby traps. You have to deactivate the key for finish the level. You can click keys and booby traps in this mode and they will be deactivated.

C is for shield mode: In this mode nothing can harm you. You will destroy traps, spears and fires.

V is for gun mode: Time will slow down in this mode. You can aim spears, traps, vases and wild "Things". After pressing V again gun mode will close and you will shoot your aims.

Press R for restart level.

Development Team: Yellowish and BelphIV

Assets: These pixel arts, sounds, music, font are assets. 

This game made with Unity

Please comment your ideas about this and our other games. Don't forget to let us know if you want us to continue this game.

Spoiler:

There are two endings in this game. If you want to see two of them: don't kill anyone or kill someone.

There is a secret path in desert area.
